attributes.action: publish a green paper reviewing all British foreign policy commitments and ensure time for public debate and a free vote in parliament before making any decision on Trident or allocating any additional Defence Dept expenditure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Troops have been committed to Kosovo, Sierra Leone, Afghanistan, Iraq and elsewhere, and US mlitary interventions have been unquestioningly supported, without the opportunity for public opinion and MPs to debate seriously what British foreign policy priorities should be. Only after treaty commitments have been considered and priorities have been set is it sensible to commit money and men to defend those priorities.
